recipe.title: Bbq Pork Steak
recipe.instructions:
1. Marinate pork steak for 24 hours in meat marinate mix and Italian dressing. Remove from marinate and brown on grill for about 20 minutes. After preparing barbeque sauce, use liberally on grilling pork steak.
  2. Sauce preparation: Mix sauce in small saucepan and cook to blend. Add corn syrup to taste.
recipe.summary: Bbq Pork Steak is a main course that serves 2. One portion of this dish contains approximately 114g of protein, 73g of fat, and a total of 1946 calories. For $10.28 per serving, this recipe covers 44% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. A mixture of butter, corn syrup, reg. flavor open bit, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. It can be enjoyed any time, but it is especially good for valentin day. 2 people were glad they tried this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free diet. It is brought to you by Foodista. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 68%. This score is solid. Bbq Pork Steak, BBQ Pork Steak Crock Pot, and BBQ Pork Steak Crock Pot are very similar to this recipe.
